<JD_START>
Job Title: Retail Media Reporting Analyst

Location: Grand Rapids, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
As a family company, we serve people and communities. When you work at Meijer, you’re provided with career and community opportunities centered around leadership, personal growth and development. Consider joining our family – take care of your career and your community!

Meijer Rewards

Weekly pay Scheduling flexibilityPaid parental leave Paid education assistanceCare.com/back-up care assistance Team member discount Development programs for advancement and career growth

Please review the job profile below and apply today!

*Hybrid Schedule offered: Monday-Wednesday in-office, Thursday-Friday flexible/remote days.*

The Reporting & Measurement Analyst is responsible for marketing technology and data infrastructure, making recommendations to increase revenue and improve spend, developing vendor-facing performance reports and measuring the impact of marketing campaigns. As a Reporting & Measurement Analyst within the Marketing Analytics organization, you will analyze marketing performance results, develop and socialize insights, and promote experimentation to identify growth opportunities. You will be the liaison between the Performance Marketing team, agency and the data analytics team to ensure we have proper measurement in place for all marketing spend. You will work closely with numerous stakeholder teams, including Marketing, Sales, Ecommerce, Data Analytics, IT and report to the Manager, Ad Operations.

What You’ll Be Doing

Own the development and maintenance of ongoing metrics, reports, analyses, dashboards, etc. to drive key business decisions.Develop effective data visualizations and analytical solutions that provide stakeholders access to critical metrics and insights.Consolidate reporting and measurement in a single report by brand.Perform manual statistical analysis as needed.Adopt best practices in reporting and analysis: data integrity, test design, analysis, validation, and documentation.

What You Bring With You (Qualifications)

3-5 years of experience in analytics / quant role and reporting at a publisher, ad network, Retail Media Network or eCommerce /retail company.Experience of working in digital marketing environment, e.g., with ad servers, web analytics, search bid management etc..Strong knowledge of SQL, statistics and proficiency in Excel.Proficiency in data visualization tools a plus, e.g., Power BI.Understanding of relational databases, ETL, database structures a plus.Experience in developing integrated reporting at category or brand level.Ability to work closely with Ad Ops, Sales as well as Tech, Data and Analytics CoETeams.Ability to work directly with external partners (Ad Agency and Tech vendors) to get access to data and get clarification / more granular information as needed.Ability to work in a fast-moving environment.Ability to synthesize and clearly communicate findings from data and research to focus on the critical issues and actionable opportunities.Eagerness to learn and a growth mindset needed to build a successful team and company.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
